title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Hedera (HBAR) Falls 12% as All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aave (AAVE) was also among the underperformers, declining 11.6% from Monday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2822.97, down 7.2% (-218.33) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (-3.8%) and DOT (-4.7%).

Laggards: HBAR (-12.0%) and AAVE (-11.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that all 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading lower with significant declines, indicating a broad market downturn.
